notes: Autonomous overnight improvement loop for TobyOnFitnessTech

visual_audit.description: Full visual design audit of /, /blog, /about, /videos — 8 specific fixes implemented

fixes.description: Category filter bar sticky position: was 'sticky top-0 z-10' which caused it to scroll UNDER the fixed 64px header (z-50). Fixed to 'sticky top-16 z-40'.
Blog hero reduced from py-20 to py-10 md:py-14 — removed excessive empty black space before category filters.
Hero section vertical padding reduced (pt-32 pb-24 md:pt-48 md:pb-32 → pt-24 pb-16 md:pt-36 md:pb-20) and pillar margin reduced (mt-24 md:mt-32 → mt-10 md:mt-14). Eliminated massive empty space.
Latest Uploads and Written Reviews sections reduced from py-24 to py-16 — tighter, more intentional vertical rhythm.
About page hero top padding reduced from pt-32 md:pt-40 to pt-20 md:pt-28 — content starts sooner without feeling cramped.
Progress photo labels replaced: removed awkward overflow-hidden circular badge design, replaced with clean gradient-to-top label strip at bottom of each photo.
Added styled hero section to Videos page: blue eyebrow label, large headline 'Everything on Camera. No Scripts. No Sponsors.', subtitle. Matches visual hierarchy of blog/about pages.
Header nav active state: added pathname detection via useEffect+useState. Active link shows white text with a blue bottom border underline. Applies to both desktop and mobile nav.
Removed invalid CSS class 'letter-spacing-wide' from blog hero paragraph (tracking-widest was already present and handling the spacing).
